prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a snake with elegant green features.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a sleek, serpentine body and vibrant leaf-like patterns.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with a mix of green and yellow accents that stands tall in the forest.
Generate a Pokemon with a slender shape and a unique tail that resembles vines.
Design a graceful, green Pokemon that thrives in grassy habitats and has a charming personality.
Make a Pokemon with a serpent-like appearance and distinctive leaf decorations.
